channel.title: PI- send message help

item.title: PI- send message help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

public void Akills2() { if (kills == 150) { getItems().addItem(995, 500000); for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { ((Client) player).sendMessage(playerName + " Achieved: Just Starting!"); } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: PI- send message help
item.dc:creator: @ltxwolf ltxwolf
item.description:
@ltxwolf wrote:

so im trying to add anchievements to my server, EX. when you kill 100 persons in pk it says (“playername” achieved: whatever!)

This is my method
public boolean Akills2() {
if (kills == 150) {
getItems().addItem(995, 500000);
sendMessage(""+playerName +" Achieved: Just Starting!");
return true;
} else {
sendMessage(""+playerName +" Achieved: Just Starting!");
return false;
}
}
It does not say “+playerName +” Achieved: Just Starting!" when you reach 150 kills.
Please help someone?
I entered the code in Client.java

Read full topic
